mention.text: Forecasters at the National Hurricane Center
the storm , which was upgraded to a Category 4 hurricane just hours before it slammed into Charleston
Meteorology professor Kerry A. Emmanuel of the Massachussetts Institute of Technology
the job of the forecaster to predict the storm 's path
